Description: Ostracon, small fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a brown slip and faint traces of three lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394767) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394767)
